transcript: disastrous. What a terrible thing it was. The army was in our hands. He had been defeated many times. If we fought right then, just one battle would have ended the war. Now it will drag on, I don't know how long it will last. Second, before, you couldn't defeat Ly. Now, he has crossed the river, and your force can only be 2/3 of that day. How can you win over your underwear? Diep May Ngan Nam, your time is over now, no one can understand my sadness. But that letter was a letter of gentle reproach. You killed him but didn't send it.
